session.authenticate-explanation: Sesteb s useqdec n yiwen seg tarrayin-agi n usesteb:
session.offline-reasons: Ayagi yezmer ad d-yeḍru ticki aqeddac yules tanekra neɣ ticki tṛuh-ak tuqqna Internet.
session.offline-explanation: Ur shissif ara! Ad tizmireḍ yal tikelt ad tesnifleḍ isemli. Ticki teqqneḍ tikelt-nniḍen, asnifel-ik ad yettwazen s wudem awurman.

editor.choose-editor-explanation: Fren imaẓragen-agi akken ad tettekkiḍ deg isemliyen: {type}
editor.not-found-explanation: A yettban d akken ur nufi ara isemli. Suref-aɣ.
editor.load-error-explanation: Teḍra-d  tuccḍa deg usali n umaẓrag. Ɛreḍ tikelt-nniḍen.

oauth.authorization-explanation: Asnas di {app_url} yebɣa ad yekcem ar tmahilin-agi n umiḍan-ik hive.js:
oauth.question: Tebɣiḍ ad tmuddeḍ izerfan?
